amendment.description: To modify the program element of the short range air defense radar program of the Army.

vote.text: Amendment SA 814 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 814 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S6898; text: CR S6898) To modify the program element of the short range air defense radar program of the Army.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 814 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 814 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
